data.enText: a long gun that fires a lot of small metal bullets, (called shot ), and is used especially for shooting birds or animals
to ride in the front passenger seat of a car or truck
to ride in the front passenger seat of a car or truck

tr: firearm that is a double-barreled smoothbore shoulder weapon for firing shot at short ranges

value.def: A shotgun is a gun used for shooting birds and animals which fires a lot of small metal balls at one time.

trans: 闪电式结婚(如因女方怀孕)
